property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution GV - Put on top of three creatures, whose race is Guardian, Great Mecha King, and/or Arc Seraphim. Meteorburn - When this creature would leaves the Battle Zone, you may send a creature under this card to the Graveyard instead. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: All of your tapped creatures that are not attacking gain Power +7000. When your creatures block, stop the attack. The battle ends, however the creatures remain tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution GV - Great Mecha, Grand Devil, and/or Liquid People. Meteorburn - When an effect of a Spell is activated, you may send a creature under this card to the Graveyard. If so, the effect of that spell is negated and it is put into its owner's Graveyard. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of attacking, you may tap this card and use the following [Tap] ability. [Tap]: Choose two opponent's creatures in the Battle Zone. Those two creatures battle each other.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Demon Command. Double Breaker When this creature is destroyed, you may return all non-Evolution Demon Command from your Graveyard to the Battle Zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution GV - Deathpuppet, Grand Devil, and/or Tyranno Drake. Meteorburn - When this creature attacks, you may send a creature under this card to Graveyard. If you do, destroy an opponent's creature. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Tyranno Drake. The power of all of your Tyranno Drake are doubled. If the power of your Tyranno Drake is 6000 or more, it gains "Double Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon a Tyranno Drake to the Battle Zone, each player chooses one of their non-Tyranno Drake and destroys them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When one of your Dreammate are destroyed, you may move a creature with the same name as that Dreammate from your Mana Zone to your Battle Zone. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, look at your deck. Select a Wild Veggie, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All other Guardian and Wild Veggies you control gain Power +3000. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] All other Arc Seraphim you control gain Power +2000. At the end of your turn, untap all other Arc Seraphim you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Dynamo] This creature can't be blocked. When this creature attacks a player and is not blocked, for each Dynamo you tapped for its "Dynamo" effect, break an extra shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, draw a card for each Great Mecha King in the Battle Zone you control. All Great Mecha King in the Battle Zone you control gain Power +1000.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks a player and is not blocked, choose a non-Evolution Grand Devil or non-Evolution Deep Marine from your Graveyard and put it into the Battle Zone. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, the player with the most shields chooses one of his/her shield, and puts it into the Graveyard. If both players have the same number of shields, both players choose one of their shields and put them into the Graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution GV - Tyranno Drake, Dreammate, and/or Human. Meteorburn - When this creature attacks, you may send a creature under this card to Graveyard. If you do, destroy all creatures with power of 4000 or less. Triple Breaker

property.value: All Dynamo creatures in the Battle Zone you control gain Power +3000. Double Breaker

property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, put all of your Dreammate and Arc Seraphim from your Graveyard into your Mana Zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your opponent puts a Fire or Nature creature into the Battle Zone, that creature comes into play tapped.

property.value: When another Arc Seraphim you control is put into the Battle Zone, tap an opponent's creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] This creature can't attack players. During the turn that this creature is destroyed, creatures cannot attack.

property.value: All Arc Seraphim and Wild Veggies you control in the Battle Zone gain "Blocker". This creature cannot attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Choose a race. For each of your creatures in the battle zone that have that race, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Grand Devil. Meteorburn - When a creature attacks, you may send a card under this card to Graveyard. If you do, return a creature with cost of 3 or less in the Battle Zone to its owner's hand. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you draw a card during your turn, draw an extra card. When of your opponent's creatures blocks your attack, discard your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All spells you cast gain "Cyclone". (Spells with "Cyclone" are returned to your hand instead of going to the Graveyard, if you play a creature before casting the spell.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a Grand Devil you control breaks a Shield, you may choose a card name instead of breaking that shield. Look at one of your opponent's shield. If it has the same name as the selected card name, put it into the Graveyard. Otherwise, put that card into its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dynamo (When another Dynamo attacks or is attacked, you may tap this creature. If you do, add this creature's power and abilities to that creature until the end of turn). When this creature attacks, look at the top card of your opponent's deck. You may put that card on the bottom of your opponent's deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cyclone (Spells with "Cyclone" are returned to your hand instead of going to the Graveyard, if you play a creature before casting the spell.) Choose a card in any Battle Zone or Mana Zone, and return it to its owner's hand.

property.value: When a Grand Devil attacks, each player chooses a card from his/her hand and discard it.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, your opponent chooses one of his/her Light or Nature creatures and destroys it.
